p: More evidence is needed to support this as an effective intervention in the context of endometriosis, however, there is a body of evidence in chronic pain more generally ( Ball et al., 2017 ; Hilton et al., 2017 ), but in the absence of harmful side effects, these strategies could be safely trialed by patients. Patients can access online material through websites or smartphone applications. If health-related anxiety and worries are interfering with a patientâ€™s everyday life, then it is critical that they are referred for professional support from a health professional trained in appropriate psychotherapy (i.e. psychologist). There are telehealth options in many jurisdictions providing high-quality psychological support, using therapeutic techniques such as CBT (focusing on identifying and changing unhelpful thought patterns, and thereby changing behaviors) and ACT (discussed below) that can be effective at managing health-related negative emotions.
